modName: Champion of Mephala Save Game Level 49
summary: A shadow warrior forgotten, risen from the past he has the Champion of Mephala an assassin of the Legendary infamous Morag Tong... :)
descriptionHtml:
Hello Guys! This is my first file Uploaded to the NEXUS EVER! So first of all if you spot any problems or anything please do tell me in the future :) If you have any build or Charachter creation requests PM me I'd gladly do it! :) Alright now to the main part this is one of my favorite charachters ever made so I decided to upload him to the Nexus the info that you need to know about him is.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Race: Dunmer (Level 49)
<br /><br />Warrior Type: Archer/Close Combat Figther/Sneaky Assassin
<br /><br />The Quests that I completed are mostly all of the Guild/Daedric quests... And I didn't complete any side of the Civil War (Although I Live for the Empire!) So you'll still have the Peace Council available during the Main Quest line...
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />NOTE: This save is a DAWNGUARD/DRAGONBORN ONE! IT'S MOSTLY DESIGNED FOR THOSE DLC'S! KEEP THAT IN MIND! Yeah I also started the quest where you meet Durak and he tells you about FT. Dawnguard and the Cultists are also dead... All the main items are found in Breezehome (Daedric Artifacts/Unique items) I do not have all of them but I'll update the save at some point!
<br /><br />I really hope you have fun with this Charachter like I do and fall in love with him he has done and been so many thing's from an assassin to a mage and from mage to warrior etc... :D
<br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />OH and the ''Mod Requirements/Reccomendations'' would be to use:
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />Etheral Elven Overhaul (To get the exact same looking Dunmer): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />XCE Morrowind Warpaint (To get the Warpaint):http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21081/?
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />Windsongs Charachter Overhaul (For better EVERYTHING!): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52322/?
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />And Dystortion's Morag Tong/Chitin Armour enchachements to get the same lookin' stuff as mine! http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31444/?
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />Upload your Screenshots too!
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br /><br />
author: Xentax God Of Thunders
